H0.text: What is an alternative name for Whit Sunday the time when, according to Christian tradition, the Holy Spirit descended on the Apostles. White Sunday

H1.text: What is an alternative name for Whit Sunday the time when, according to Christian tradition, the Holy Spirit descended on the Apostles. Holy Ghost Day

H2.text: What is an alternative name for Whit Sunday the time when, according to Christian tradition, the Holy Spirit descended on the Apostles. Apostles' Day

H3.text: What is an alternative name for Whit Sunday the time when, according to Christian tradition, the Holy Spirit descended on the Apostles. Pentecost

A4.text: Whitsun (also Whitsunday or Whit Sunday) is the name used in Britain, and other countries among Anglicans and Methodists, for the Christian holy day of Pentecost.

A5.text: The name is a contraction of 'White Sunday', attested in 'the Holy Ghost, whom thou didst send on Whit-sunday' in the Old English homilies

A6.text: The term Whit Sunday derives from the custom of the newly baptized wearing white clothing, and from the white vestments worn by the clergy in English liturgical uses.
